name: Birds Dont Exist
description:
Everybody knows that birds arent real, and they are robots made by the government to put "trackers" on our cars and surroundings, in this game you are playing as a robot bird trying to put as many "trackers" on cars as possible.

controls 

SPACE, W, S, UP arrow, DOWN arrow, MOUSE

(this is my first game so it is quite bad, just so you know)
